message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1300000, but that's the lowest I can go. I'm confident the product is worth it to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $1100000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to compromise, so I'll meet you in the middle at $1200000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
